CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS( $UserRole.Name ,'Campaign-Social') && (CONTAINS(Assigned_Social_Owner__r.UserRole.Name,'Campaign') || CONTAINS(Assigned_Social_Owner__r.UserRole.Name,'Social')), true, IF(CONTAINS( $UserRole.Name ,'Social') && CONTAINS(Assigned_Social_Owner__r.UserRole.Name,'Xtend - Social'), true , IF(CONTAINS( $UserRole.Name ,'Campaign L2'), IF(CONTAINS( $UserRole.Name ,'KA-North'),CONTAINS(Assigned_Social_Owner__r.UserRole.Name,'Team KA') || CONTAINS(Assigned_Social_Owner__r.UserRole.Name,'Team North') || Assigned_Social_Owner__r.Id = $User.Id, CONTAINS(Assigned_Social_Owner__r.UserRole.Name,'Team DSP') || CONTAINS(Assigned_Social_Owner__r.UserRole.Name,'Team South') || Assigned_Social_Owner__r.Id = $User.Id) , IF(CONTAINS( $UserRole.Name ,'SEM L1') && CONTAINS(Assigned_Social_Owner__r.UserRole.Name,'SEM'), true, IF(CONTAINS( $UserRole.Name ,'SEM L2') && CONTAINS(Assigned_Social_Owner__r.UserRole.Name,'SEM') && NOT(CONTAINS(Assigned_Social_Owner__r.UserRole.Name,'L1')), IF(NOT(CONTAINS(Assigned_Social_Owner__r.UserRole.Name,'L2')), true, Assigned_Social_Owner__r.Id = $User.Id) , IF(CONTAINS( $UserRole.Name ,'Programmatic L1') && CONTAINS(Assigned_Social_Owner__r.UserRole.Name,'Programmatic'), true , IF(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name,'Programmatic L2') && CONTAINS(Assigned_Social_Owner__r.UserRole.Name,'Programmatic'),((NOT(CONTAINS(Assigned_Social_Owner__r.UserRole.Name,'L2'))&&((CONTAINS(Assigned_Social_Owner__r.UserRole.Name,'KA') && CONTAINS($UserRole.Name,'KA')) || (CONTAINS(Assigned_Social_Owner__r.UserRole.Name,'NSW') && CONTAINS($UserRole.Name,'NSW')) || (CONTAINS(Assigned_Social_Owner__r.UserRole.Name,'QLD') && CONTAINS($UserRole.Name,'QLD')) || (CONTAINS(Assigned_Social_Owner__r.UserRole.Name,'VIC/SA') && CONTAINS($UserRole.Name,'VIC/SA')))) || Assigned_Social_Owner__r.Id = $User.Id), Assigned_Social_Owner__r.Id = $User.Id) ) ) )) ) )
CustomField.label: My Teams PO(Social)
